name: Slippymander
description:
Strategically lose limbs to escape the kitchen!

Chop them, fry them, pan-sear them. And press 'E' to grow them back!

Don't lose your head or fall on the floor D:

Controls:

WASD to Move

Hold right click to rotate camera

Space to jump (only when you are missing your front legs)

W on climbable surfaces to climb (only when you are missing your back legs)\

Created in 48 hours for Seattle Indies Game Jam 2019
